tossup_question: 23) PHYSICS  In going form a denser to rarer medium an array of light is
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Un-deviated
X) Bent away from the normal
Y) Bent towards the normal
Z) Polarized
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) Bent towards the normal
